item.title: Benjamin Bengfort
item.description: Founder and CEO, Rotational Labs, LLC. Creator of Yellowbrick, machine learning practitioner, distributed systems developer, data science educator, O’Reilly author, Guyanese-American, BBQ enthusiast

item.title: Daniel Sollis
item.description: Junior Software Engineer at Rotational Labs, LLC, focusing on distributed systems. Python and Go programmer, Cal State Fullerton graduate, David Lynch obsessive and mediocre guitar player.

item.title: Edwin Schmierer
item.description: Founder and COO, Rotational Labs, LLC.

item.title: Nabiha Naqvie
item.description: Data scientist with a background in molecular biology and an interest in applied Natural Language Processing and Distributed Systems.

item.title: Patrick Deziel
item.description: Distributed Systems Engineer Python and Go programmer, machine learning enthusiast, sci-fi addict.

item.title: Rebecca Bilbro
item.description: Founder and CTO, Rotational Labs, LLC. Creator of Yellowbrick, applied NLP developer, Python & Go programmer, data science educator, O’Reilly author, bad ukulelist.

item.title: Tianshu Li
item.description: Data scientist and NLP specialist with a PhD in Systems Engineering and an enduring curiosity for learning, open source, and new culinary adventures.
